title: Gakuen♡Tengoku: Sore wa Koi desu Koizumi-kun
original_name: 学園 ♡ 天国 それは恋です小泉くん
sinopse:
A boy wearing a facade of a pristine angel, Koizumi-kun, and the class's disliked Kashiwabara-kun, and their changed relationship since the day they had sex.

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot: Long Vacation
